Question: Shenzhen Lifengda Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
TCL Electronics

CES 2024: TCL will showcase over a hundred cutting-edge products, including QD-Mini LED TVs, TCL FreshIN air conditioners, TCL Free Built-in Series refrigerators, washing machines, feature-rich mobile devices, AR glasses, and commercial displays. The company will introduce one of the industry’s first smart connected mobile device entertainment solutions, as well as the latest NXTPAPER display technology and RayNeo AR glasses with revolutionary full-color 3D head-up display and powerful AI capabilities. TCL will also demonstrate its commitment to a greater and more sustainable future through its latest environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives. The company has witnessed consistent growth throughout the first three quarters of 2023, with leading positions in various global markets for TVs, mobile devices, and other products.
Summary_cn:
TCL电子

CES 2024: TCL将展示超过一百种先进产品，包括QD-Mini LED电视、TCL FreshIN空调、TCL Free内置系列冰箱、洗衣机、功能丰富的移动设备、AR眼镜和商用显示器。公司将推出行业首款智能连接的移动设备娱乐解决方案之一，以及最新的NXTPAPER显示技术和具有革命性全彩色3D抬头显示和强大人工智能功能的RayNeo AR眼镜。TCL还将通过最新的环境、社会和治理（ESG）倡议展示其对更美好和可持续未来的承诺。公司在2023年的前三个季度中保持了持续增长，在电视、移动设备和其他产品的各个全球市场中占据领先地位。
